title: Obelisk
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Obelisk

Obelisk may refer to:

  • Obelisk of Water, used to make Water orbs (Charge Water Orb, Magic level 56. If making water battlestaff afterward, Crafting level 54)
  • Obelisk of Earth, used to make Earth orbs (Charge Earth Orb, Magic level 60. If making earth battlestaff afterward, Crafting level 58)
  • Obelisk of Fire, used to make Fire orbs (Charge Fire Orb, Magic level 63. If making fire battlestaff afterward, Crafting level 62)
  • Obelisk of Air, used to make Air orbs (Charge Air Orb, Magic level 66. If making air battlestaff afterward, Crafting level 66)
  • Wilderness obelisk, a teleportation device for moving around the Wilderness
  • Obelisk (Construction), the player-owned house version of the Wilderness obelisk
  • Obelisk (Necropolis), used to unlock the teleport to Jaltevas via the Pharaoh's sceptre
  • Magical Obelisk in Hallowed Sepulchre
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:

*[[Obelisk of Water]], used to make [[Water orb]]s (Charge Water Orb, Magic level 56. If making water battlestaff afterward, Crafting level 54)
*[[Obelisk of Earth]], used to make [[Earth orb]]s (Charge Earth Orb, Magic level 60. If making earth battlestaff afterward, Crafting level 58)
*[[Obelisk of Fire]], used to make [[Fire orb]]s (Charge Fire Orb, Magic level 63. If making fire battlestaff afterward, Crafting level 62)
*[[Obelisk of Air]], used to make [[Air orb]]s (Charge Air Orb, Magic level 66. If making air battlestaff afterward, Crafting level 66)
*[[Wilderness obelisk]], a [[teleportation]] device for moving around the [[Wilderness]]
*[[Obelisk (Construction)]], the [[player-owned house]] version of the Wilderness obelisk
*[[Obelisk (Necropolis)]], used to unlock the teleport to Jaltevas via the [[Pharaoh's sceptre]]
*[[Magical Obelisk]] in [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]
